name: Life Lynk
description:
Dodge, duck and weave around enemy fire while you try to destroy the alien threat! There's one catch, your weapon systems run off of your powersuits energy, which is what keeps you alive. Any weapons fire will decrease your health so watch out!

Created by:

  • Keanen Collins
  • Max Summerbell
  • Kyle Hillier
  • Nico Formaggio
  • Darryn Green
